org.pinus4j.datalayer.query

Interface IGlobalSlaveQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataQuery
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlobalJdbcSlaveQueryImpl
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface IGlobalSlaveQuery
extends IDataQuery
    global slave database query interface. this interface has deprecated, replace by IGlobalQuery
    Since:
    0.7.1
    Author:
    duanbn
    See Also:
    IGlobalQuery
